---------
During World War II (1939-1945), Casablanca was a city where people came fleeing Nazism everywhere was easy to reach, but out was nearly impossible, especially if the name of fugitive lists contained in the Gestapo.This time, the aim of the German secret police is Czech leader and Resistance hero Victor Laszlo, whose only hope is Rick Blaine, owner of 'Rick's CafÃƒÂ©' and his wife's former lover, Ilsa.When Ilsa offers to stay in exchange for a visa to bring the country Laszlo, Rick must choose between her own happiness or idealism that governed his life in the past.
